<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/55e29611d20bca14fa5efc61385bc8a6b7acd9e2|patch 8.2.1933: cannot sort using locale ordering>
patch 8.2.1933: cannot sort using locale ordering

Problem:    Cannot sort using locale ordering.
Solution:   Add a flag for :sort and sort() to use the locale. (Dominique
            Pellé, closes #7237)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1933: cannot sort using locale ordering · vim/vim@55e2961
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1933: cannot sort using locale ordering · vim/vim@55e2961
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot sort using locale ordering. Solution: Add a flag for :sort and sort() to use the locale. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7237)

Solution:   Add argument type checking for extend().
